Harry Seymour

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Workman
  3. Location of Family: South Bend, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Ashland, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: Info sheet states Harry first went to the Workman family, and later to Martin Zaar. But Harry isn't listed with the Zaar family in the 1910, 1920, 1930, or 1940 censuses.
  10. Source: National Orphan Train Complex
